fields.name: Drag Crimp
fields.description: A hold where the fingers are positioned in a crimp grip, but are dragged across the hold instead of pulling down.

fields.name: Half Crimp
fields.description: A hold where the fingers are positioned in a crimp grip with the first joint bent at a 90 degree angle.

fields.name: Full Crimp
fields.description: A hold where the fingers are positioned in a crimp grip with the second joint bent at a 90 degree angle.

fields.name: Sloper
fields.description: A hold that is sloping downward, requiring an open hand grip.

fields.name: Pinch
fields.description: A hold where the fingers are positioned on either side of the hold, pinching it.

fields.name: Jug
fields.description: A large hold that can be gripped easily with the whole hand.
